physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Multiple Spitz nevi identified in nine patients, with lesions most commonly present on lower extremities, trunk, and neck, varying from pink, dome-shaped papules to uniform brown.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: One patient (patient 9) presented with approximately 80 nevi, gradually developing new melanocytic nevi similar to patients with atypical nevus syndrome, with a greater density of Spitz nevi on sun-exposed skin.
